description: [PLEAD](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0435) samples were found to be highly obfuscated with junk code.(Citation: ESET PLEAD Malware July 2018)(Citation: TrendMicro BlackTech June 2017)

external_references.description: Cherepanov, A.. (2018, July 9). Certificates stolen from Taiwanese tech‑companies misused in Plead malware campaign. Retrieved May 6, 2020.
Bermejo, L., et al. (2017, June 22). Following the Trail of BlackTech’s Cyber Espionage Campaigns. Retrieved May 5, 2020.
